headline: Allegiant Adds New Global Hotel Booking Platform Powered by Rocket Travel by Agoda
summary: Allegiant, ranked as 2025's Best Low-Cost Airline in North America in the Skytrax World Airline Awards, has partnered with Rocket Travel by Agoda, the strategic partnerships arm of Agoda. The agreement will introduce the airline's customers to a new hotel booking platform. The platform, Allegiant Hotels, will enable Allegiant Allways Rewards members and customers to book hotels worldwide whilst earning or redeeming Allegiant points.

headline: The Zacks Analyst Blog Highlights Meta Platforms, SAP SE, Booking Holdings and Willis Lease Finance
summary: Meta, SAP and Booking gain on AI adoption, cloud momentum and global travel strength, while Willis Lease works to stabilize after a challenging year.
